text:
@realDonaldTrump Pathological liar, corrupt criminal #donaldtrump BRAGGED we will have a final total of 60,000 deaths by August ( good news to him). But we have 56,634 already & we are only in April. Something isn't adding up here...I guess #COVID19 will be stopped in its track soon.
#TrumpLies
